name: AudioContext.createMediaStreamDestination
description: The MediaStream is created when the node is created and is accessible via the MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode's stream attribute. This stream can be used in a similar way as a MediaStream obtained via navigator.getUserMedia — it can, for example, be sent to a remote peer using the RTCPeerConnection addStream() method.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'createMediaStreamDestination()' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
